#summary Introduction to the dns_watcher.py program.

= Introduction =

A simple script that can monitor a DNS RR over time. For example, if today:

www.google.com IN TXT "192.168.0.1/32"

and tomorrow:
www.google.com IN TXT "192.168.0.2/32"

Alert via email to a responsible party who cares about this change.

= Details =

the details are sparse, as the code is simple and the problem also is simple.
